text: has anyone here had any luck doing a blog import (using smart import)? It's coming over from a not-so-popular blog platform, but follows principles like rss feeds and such. It's been at it for 3 hours so far with nothing to show for
It takes a while and isn’t always perfect, but is still more efficient in my experience than manual migration. I’d advise letting it run overnight and checking on it the next morning.
